resources.string: \"Let\'s say someone says, \'In a million years, no one will know the difference\'. The proper response is not \'Well, then everything is meaningless\', but \'any idiot can choose a frame of time in which nothing (present) matters. Talking yourself into irrelevance is not a profound critique of being, it is a cheap trick of the rationalizing mind.\'\" \n\n- Jordan Peterson
